title: Google Pixel 3aXL takes 10-15 seconds to pick up or hang up any call that comes through.
content: Google Pixel 3aXL takes 10-15 seconds to pick  up or hang up any call that comes through. This happens with both standard phone app that Google provides and WhatsApp calls alike. It also takes the same amount of time to hang up the calls as well. This is very annoying as you can tell
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
